edges.evidence: NFATC2IP is known to interact with NFATC2 to modulate its activity (PMID: 12021261).
NFATC2 is activated by calcineurin through dephosphorylation (PMID: 10412979).
Calcineurin has been shown to interact with HSP90, affecting its function (PMID: 15014431).
HSP90, along with CDC37, stabilizes client kinases (PMID: 10966457).

paths.summary: NFATC2IP binds NFATC2, activating calcineurin, which interacts with HSP90 to stabilize CDC37.

edges.evidence: NFATC2IP is known to interact with NFATC2 to modulate its activity (PMID: 12021261).
NFATC2 is activated by calcineurin through dephosphorylation (PMID: 10412979).
Calcineurin has been shown to interact with HSP90, affecting its function (PMID: 15014431).
HSP90 associates with CDC37 to form a chaperone complex (PMID: 10966457).

paths.summary: NFATC2IP binds NFATC2, activating calcineurin, which interacts with HSP90 associating with CDC37.
